question:
####[UFAQ 24](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
If the Runner uses Logic Bomb to bypass a piece of ice on which they have already broken all subroutines, are those subroutines still considered broken for the purposes of card abilities (such as [Inversificator](/en/card/12048))?
####[UFAQ 23](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Whispers_in_Nalubaale_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs] Can the Runner use Logic Bomb when they have no remaining ?
answer: Yes. Losing remaining is part of the ability's effect, not part of its cost.
